entry.title: MOVIE NIGHT
entry.summary:
Author: notsi11yw0rm (si11yw0rm)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,576Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 51

Summary: Seungmin knew he should move.He could almost hear his brother’s voice in his head — a warning and a reminder at the same time that Chan had been around since they were kids, the big brother Seungmin wasn’t supposed to think about like this.But Chan wasn’t looking at him like an older brother should. The movie light flickered over them, shadows playing along Chan’s jaw, his eyes fixed on Seungmin like he was the only thing worth watching. For years, Seungmin’s only had one goal whenever he was alone with his older brother’s best friend — sit close enough to Bang Chan to pretend it’s an accident. But tonight, Chan’s the one closing the distance, and Seungmin realizes he might finally get exactly what he’s been wanting… and more than he’s ready for.
